mapper.insert: insert into item (item_id, seller_id, item_name, price, quantity, description_detail, image_detail) values (null, #{sellerId}, #{itemName}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{descriptionDetail},#{imageDetail})
mapper.update: update item set item_name=#{item.itemName}, price=#{item.price}, quantity=#{item.quantity}, description_detail=#{item.descriptionDetail}, image_detail=#{item.imageDetail} where item_id = #{id}
